name: Cronos
description: Cronos (Greek: Κρόνος), was the leader and last of the mighty Titans who were born to Gaia and Ouranos. He fathered the first of the Olympians with his wife Rhea. He fought in the Titanomachy where he was overthrown by his son Zeus. His punishment by Zeus after the battle was to forever carry Pandora's Temple on his back in chains. He is a minor character in God of War, a minor ally in God of War II and a major antagonist in God of War III.

biographicalInformation.location: Desert of Lost Souls (God of War)  Tartarus (God of War III)
biographicalInformation.status: Deceased (Stabbed in the head by Kratos with the Blade of Olympus)
